typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Deliver Point Code} as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Delivery_Point_ID as integer,
		Deliver_Point_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp,
		Update_DateTime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Source_File as string,
		Batch_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Delivery_Point_ID]\n      ,[Deliver_Point_Code]\n      ,[Delivery_Point]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n      ,[Update_DateTime]\n      ,[Process_Name]\n      ,[Source_File]\n      ,[Batch_ID]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Delivery_Point]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp
RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp select(mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp = Deliver_Point_Code,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp = Delivery_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
DataTransformation, SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp lookup({Deliver Point Code} == Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
CheckDimensionRecordExist derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = ERROR_FUNCTION('iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), __SINGLE_QUOTE__Australia/Sydney__SINGLE_QUOTE__), ")')) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testDimDeliveryPoint.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
